questions.question: You plan on how to spend and save your money to achieve goals.
Student loans: Why should you pay more than the minimum monthly payment?

choices.answer: You will pay it off more quickly so you pay less interest
Your student loan interest rates change monthly
You can only defer loans after two years after graduation
Take your time because all student loans are interest-free

questions.question: Savings account: Jude earns interest on his new principal and interest.
Liquidity: which is the most liquid? (quickest to get money and spend it)
Credit card lost/stolen: the first step to take to prevent financial damage

choices.answer: File a complaint with the FTC
Call and cancel the credit card

questions.question: Alisha wants to file bankruptcy.  Her friends are trying to discourage her from filing for bankruptcy.  Why?

choices.answer: She will keep most of her debt.
She will have to pay all her debts.
It will severely damage her credit rating.

questions.question: Which action would improve your credit score?

choices.answer: Make credit card payments every other month.
Paying with only cash at all times.
Take out a loan and make payments on time.
File for bankruptcy and write bad checks.

questions.question: What is a drawback of using credit cards?

choices.answer: Earn rewards by using the card
May have to pay finance charges

questions.question: Kierra believes she is a victim of identity theft.  What is the wrong thing to do in this case?

choices.answer: Put a fraud alert on credit reports
File a complaint with the FTC

questions.question: When you have a home loan, what is your collateral for this loan?
Tammy only makes the minimum payment each month when she receives her credit card bill.  What amount is she paying?

choices.answer: The required amount she must pay
The maximum amount she can pay
The adjusted credit balance for the month
The finance charge she has incurred on the balance

choices.answer: To check for errors and credit fraud
